snippet: The remains of two men were found outside a former American Special Forces base in Afghanistan on Saturday, shortly after two other bodies were found nearby.
abstract: Remains of two men are found outside former American Special Forces base in Afghanistan, two days after two other bodies were found nearby; bodies may belong to some of 17 people in Wardak province who Afghan investigators say disappeared into American custody.

byline.original: By SANGAR RAHIMI and ROD NORDLAND
byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi reported from Kabul, and Rod Nordland from London. Sharifullah Sahak contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: The remains of two men were found outside a former American Special Forces base in Afghanistan on Saturday, shortly after two other bodies were found nearby.

headline.seo: Brother’s Search Comes to Grim End in Afghanistan
headline.main: Brother’s Search Comes to a Grim End in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Brother’s Search Comes to a Grim End in Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
